body:
I know a lot of you from just seeing you in game or maybe talking with you on this forums. I don't know anything about any of you. Tell me something about you :)

- I'm 15

- Mine craft is pretty much my life ;D

- I've been in a small state of depression the past few months, but I'm doing better :)

- I'm homeschooled. For the most part it's pretty good

- If I had to pick someone to be my best friend it would be izjust4delolz

That's all, I think. You can ask me what ever, I'll answer just about anything :)

- I love to cook, and my favorite thing to make is Ramen Stew (Its not that easy to make ironically.)

- I played Mario Kart competitively for about 3 years, and I'm starting to get back into it. I also play smash competitively.

replies.body: Well when the initial game came out I loved it! It was fast paced and fun and everything was great. However, then I started to realize that the amount of luck in mk8 is significantly higher than in past games. Now, every since the last DLC pack back in November I feel that the items have been a little bit nice, and maybe they will change some things in the next DLC pack that counes out on the 23rd, but I can only wish. It is a fantastic game still! Its the best looking game on the Wii U, Deffinatly best sound track by far. So yes it is a fantastic buy! I highly recommend it, but there will be raging also bundled with the game so be cautious.
replies.body_tagged: Well when the initial game came out I loved it! It was fast paced and fun and everything was great. However, then I started to realize that the amount of luck in mk8 is significantly higher than in past games. Now, every since the last DLC pack back in November I feel that the items have been a little bit nice, and maybe they will change some things in the next DLC pack that counes out on the 23rd, but I can only wish. It is a fantastic game still! Its the best looking game on the Wii U, Deffinatly best sound track by far. So yes it is a fantastic buy! I highly recommend it, but there will be raging also bundled with the game so be cautious.

replies.body:
I'm 15.

Minecraft is just something that I use when I don't have time for the world.

Music is my life. I live and breathe it; without it I can't survive.

I enjoy playing several different songs on piano.

I play Pokemon (i'm up for challenges on showdown c:< )

I enjoy making food. It's a life skill.

I love "deep" movies such as Interstellar and Inception, and also war movies such as Lone Survivor, Saving Private Ryan, and Schindler's List (highly recommend).

I like to talk philosophically at times, despite my young age.

I mostly talk to RileGuy and YesPlease on Avicus, but in real life, I have other friends.

replies.body:
I'm 15.

I've been playing the drumset since I was 7, and the French horn since 11.

I have been playing Super Smash Bros. for Wii U a lot, and I love it, especially the Gamer stage! :)

I also love Pokémon, particularly Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum.

For whatever reason, I study a lot about wars from 1000 A.D. to present day. I also know a lot about geography.

I'm on my high school's crew/rowing team.

I do have a minor case of Asperger's Syndrome, so I can get very irritable at times, but I've been able to keep it under control for a while now.

If I had to pick my best friend on this server, I'd probably have to go with MLGPorky, because he was really the one who got me to come out of my shell when I first came to the server.

My question: Based on what's above, do we have anything in common (I really hope we do :D)?

replies.body: We are both 15...  That's it xD
replies.body_tagged: We are both 15...  That's it xD

reply_to.body:
I'm 15.

I've been playing the drumset since I was 7, and the French horn since 11.

I have been playing Super Smash Bros. for Wii U a lot, and I love it, especially the Gamer stage! :)

I also love Pokémon, particularly Diamond, Pearl, and Platinum.

For whatever reason, I study a lot about wars from 1000 A.D. to present day. I also know a lot about geography.

I'm on my high school's crew/rowing team.

I do have a minor case of Asperger's Syndrome, so I can get very irritable at times, but I've been able to keep it under control for a while now.

If I had to pick my best friend on this server, I'd probably have to go with MLGPorky, because he was really the one who got me to come out of my shell when I first came to the server.

My question: Based on what's above, do we have anything in common (I really hope we do :D)?
reply_to.body_tagged:

I've been playing the drumset since I was 7, and the French horn since 11.

I have been playing Super Smash Bros. for Wii U a lot, and I love it, especially the Gamer stage! :)

For whatever reason, I study a lot about wars from 1000 A.D. to present day. I also know a lot about geography.

I do have a minor case of Asperger's Syndrome, so I can get very irritable at times, but I've been able to keep it under control for a while now.

replies.body:
I have an age.

I love building, and hate it just as much.

All-boys school b/c I can't talk to girls for shit.

I have no friends here. You might think the people in my friends list are my friends, but secretly they are on my murder list. :P

I can't be bothered to think about how the world will go down in a couple more years.

Sub to me on YT or I will cut your throat and hang you from your feet from a sycamore tree and then use your limp dead finger to click the fucking subscribe button.

I'm a perfectly calm and non-violent individual. I COMPLETELY despise those who speak of dark murder plots.

I just pvp because I wanna kill something and take a break from building.

My type of humor is sick twisted humor. Im also friends with Satan.

I really have nothing worth bragging about in my life.

I play golf, but I don't go for hole in ones, I go for 100 meter headshots.
